is a React hook that provides access to: is a React hook that provides access to the translation function (t) and current language state. It can only be used in Client Components.
is the root component that provides int: is the root component that provides internationalization context to your entire application. It manages language state, handles cookie persistence, and ensures zero hydration mismatch in SSR.

Always wrap your entire application with: Always wrap your entire application with I18nProvider at the root layout level to ensure all components have access to translations.
Automatically wrap Korean/English text w: Automatically wrap Korean/English text with t() function
Avoid nesting I18nProvider components. U: Avoid nesting I18nProvider components. Use only one provider at the root level.
By reading the language from cookies on: By reading the language from cookies on the server, you ensure that the initial HTML matches what the client expects, preventing hydration mismatches.
Do: Place at the root of your app: Do: Place at the root of your app
Don't: Construct keys with complex logic: Don't: Construct keys with complex logic
Extract translation keys from your codeb: Extract translation keys from your codebase
Fallback to key if translation missing: Fallback to key if translation missing
